pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.html:
there is another comment thread in this PR talking about the Get prefix:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/73/slimmed-down-the-plugin-pull-request-no/activity#comment-46722394

@mxgrey brought up some valid points in favor of it, so maybe interested parties could have a brief discussion about it in person to clarify how we reach consensus on our code style
